faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Frequently asked questions about the JSON translation tool

items.question: What does this tool do?
items.answer: This is an AI-powered JSON internationalization translation tool that helps developers quickly translate JSON language files into multiple languages while maintaining the integrity of the JSON structure.

items.question: How to use this tool?
items.answer:
1. Upload the JSON file you need to translate
2. Select the target language
3. Enter your API Key
4. Click Start Translation
5. Download the result after translation is complete

items.question: What languages are supported?
items.answer: Currently supports multiple languages including English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, French, German, Spanish, Russian, and more.

items.question: Will my API Key be saved?
items.answer: No. Your API Key is only used temporarily in the browser and will not be saved or transmitted to any server.

items.question: How to ensure translation quality?
items.answer: We use AI models for translation to ensure the accuracy of professional terminology and the naturalness of language expression. We also support custom dictionary functions to maintain the consistency of specific terms.

items.question: Is there a file size limit?
items.answer: The maximum size for a single JSON file is 10MB. For larger files, it is recommended to translate them in batches.

cta.title: Use the AI Translation Tool Now
cta.description: Quickly and accurately translate your JSON language files into multiple languages
